name: Anemia Survey
description: Survey dataset with maternal and health-related factors related to anemia.

columns.name: Mothers.Age
columns.description: Age range of the mother (e.g., 20-24, 25-29, etc.).

columns.name: Residence.Type
columns.description: Whether the mother lives in an urban or rural area.

columns.name: Education.Level
columns.description: Highest level of education completed by the mother (e.g., Secondary, Higher).

columns.name: Birth.Amount
columns.description: Number of children born in the delivery (e.g., 1, 2).

columns.name: Birthing.Age
columns.description: Age of the mother at childbirth.

columns.name: Anemia.Level
columns.description: Degree of anemia diagnosed (e.g., Mild, Moderate, Not anemic).

columns.name: Mosquito.Net
columns.description: Indicates whether the mother uses a mosquito net (Yes/No).

columns.name: Smoke.Cigarettes
columns.description: Indicates whether the mother smokes cigarettes (Yes/No).

columns.name: Maritial.Status
columns.description: Marital status of the mother (e.g., Married, Single).

columns.name: Fever
columns.description: Indicates whether the mother had a fever (Yes/No).
